name: Pipo the Shooting Star
description:
Pipo is an incredibly smart dog , even smarter than some human . Pipo works for firemen , and he his trained to save people , but he don't want to , he want to eat them COOKED .

Inspired by this french comicstrip:

 http://gloryowlcomix.blogspot.com/2017/08/392.html

Seriously , I'm new at LOVE programming , this game was just a little training.
